memory: To complete the task of picking up the box, I should have taken a more direct approach. Upon starting, I should have moved south to reach the box's location, instead of turning left and right multiple times. Specifically, I should have turned right at time 11 and gone forward to reach the box, avoiding the unnecessary turns and backtracking.
